events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund because it doesn't match the description.
The customer issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the keywords and refund request in the message.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in handling refund requests and related customer inquiries.
Hello! I'm Sarah. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your recent order. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I also kindly ask for the reason you found the product unsatisfactory besides the mismatch?
The product color was completely different and it feels very cheap compared to the pictures. My order number is 7834521.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund once you send back the product. I'll email you prepaid shipping labels to return the item.
Thanks, that sounds fair. I will ship it back tomorrow and let you know when itâ€™s sent.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there has been no further communication, we are closing your refund request case. Thank you for contacting support.
